data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zografidis, Aris (2016): Two new infraspecific taxa of Verbascumdelphicum (Scrophulariaceae, Scrophularieae) from mainland Greece and the island of Evvia. PhytoKeys 74: 107-122, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.74.10381, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.74.10381
